name: Side A: Spanglish
description:
Side A: Spanglish is a themed cryptic crossword. You can solve it by printing the image or the PDF available on this site, but it’s much more comfortable to solve online on Crosshare.

Other cryptic crosswords by me can be found on this link.

Rules

This video is a general introduction to cryptic crossword rules, while this one is a little more in-depth, but you can look up several other explanations (in video or text) all throughout the internet.

This cryptic in particular features the following additional rule:

All solutions are in Spanish y todas las pistas están en inglés.
